title: DateTime Datatype Schema
description: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month) as used in human communication. The format is YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+zz:zz, e.g. 2018, 1973-06, 1905-08-23, 2015-02-07T13:28:17-05:00 or 2017-01-01T00:00:00.000Z

originalText.description: The original value sent in source data

value.description: The ISO 8601 formatted date and time value with seconds and timezone offset
